SEARCH

Package com.serezk4.io.socket.client

package com.serezk4.io.socket.client
Provides classes and interfaces for client-side socket communication.

This package focuses on implementing the client-side logic for establishing connections, sending commands, and receiving responses from the server.

Key Features:

  • Interactive command reading and validation from the console.
  • Serialization of commands and their arguments for network transmission.
  • Non-blocking communication using streams for efficient data handling.
  • Robust error handling for scenarios like server unavailability.

Design Goals:

  • Provide a user-friendly interface for sending commands to the server.
  • Ensure smooth handling of transient network issues.
  • Adhere to Java best practices for client-server interaction.
Since:
1.0
  • Class
    Description
    Client
    A client application that connects to a server, sends requests, and processes responses.
